
Interpreting the results:

1)
refer results below.



2) 
For a regression tree also, nmin does impact the accuracy of predications.
As can be seen from Q6ExtraCredit_Housing.png:
higher the value of nmin -> less is the mean squared error ==> more the no. of instances at leaf node, better is the predicted value per node



3) 
same as above.



4)
Check Q6ExtraCredit_Housing.png image file. As can be seen, training and test outputs overlap
Hence, the model is overfitted.

***********************************************************************************************************************************************************************

Housing data:
Best nmin is:  0.2
